original_text: “‘But if the accused ever goes outside the limits of the city of refuge to which they fled
korean_text: 그러나 살인자가 어느 때든지 그 피하였던 도피성 지경 밖에 나가면

sentences.original_text: But if the accused ever goes outside
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 피고인이 언젠가 밖으로 나간다면

sentences.original_text: the limits of the city of refuge
